modName: TES Healer Things of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
Brief description:
This mod will add:
- A Healer Weapons and armors sets,
- A Healer Venom,
- A Healer Saved game,
- A Healer Build ReadMe/Articles based on previous TES games Healers classes (Morrowind & Oblivion),
- A Healer Wallpapers sets,
- A bit of immersion (in TES Healer Lore).
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][u][b][color=#cc4125][size=3]

[img]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120310214157/elderscrolls/images/thumb/1/10/Class_creation_healer.png/130px-0,225,7,206-Class_creation_healer.png[/img][/size][/color][/b][/u][/center][center][u][size=3][b][color=#cc4125]Brief description:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]This mod will add:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A Healer Weapons and armors sets,
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A Healer Venom,
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A Healer Saved game,
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A Healer Build ReadMe/Articles based on previous TES games Healers classes (Morrowind & Oblivion),
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A Healer Wallpapers sets,
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- A bit of immersion (in TES Healer Lore).
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Weapons and armors sets:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Basically, it is just a Elven, Elven Gilded, Dwarven, Glass, Clothes, and a Venoms stuff renames.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]It is fully craftable, upgradable, and you can enchant the whole sets.[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]You will find him under the Elven, the Dwarven, and under the Glass smithing category at any forge if you have the required perks.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]You can also use the console commands and press (tilde key) Â²
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]And then:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]help "healer"
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]!Only the Venom cannot be crafted or cooking, but you can obtain it by the use of console commands! *
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Saved game:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Ancus (is a level 1 Breton Male Mage/Healer) who stand by Helgen Inn, just after have done the quest "Unbound".
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]He don't have the weapons and the armors sets on him because
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]=
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]300/300
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125](full carry weight) *

[/color][/b][/size][/u][u][size=3][b][color=#cc4125]Build:[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]You can read my Healer Build under "Articles" or under "ReadMe".[/color][/b][/size][/u][u][size=3][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][/size][size=3][color=#cc4125][img]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120310213835/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c0/Class_Interface.png/300px-Class_Interface.png[/img][/color][b][color=#cc4125]
Wallpapers:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Includes in the archive, see in "Wallpapers" (For PC, Tablet, Mobilephone, or FB). *
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]NO REQUIREMENT.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]DLC FREE.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]I PURPOSE.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]If you want to change (sex/race) or rename Ancus:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/?]ShowRaceMenu Alternative by Seb263[/url][/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]
Thanks to:
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]The Matrix Prime.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]English Version.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]French Version.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Done by me.

[/color][/b][/size][/u][u][size=3][b][color=#cc4125]Sorry, for my bad English, I'm French ppl.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]New in modding.
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]Be pretty.[/color][/b][/size][/u][u][size=3][b][color=#cc4125]
[/color][/b][color=#cc4125][img]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120310214157/elderscrolls/images/1/10/Class_creation_healer.png[/img][/color][/size][/u][/center]
